name: Michael Collects Tax Money Prototype
description:
Hello! Welcome to  Michael Collects Tax Money!

You play as Michael, You must collect Tax Money! but at the same time avoid Mr NoTax's Workers, who if they hit you 5 times you die, so be carful!

Collect all the money and you win! 

Right now the game is in VERY early development, so that's why there is only 1 level, 1 type of enemy, and only one thing to collect, Once I get Clickteam fusion 2.5 Full version, then there will be a full story, more items to collect, and more enemy's, even 3 endings! but that'll have to wait, because right now I don't have the full version, so uh- enjoy this prototype i guess?

If you wish to contact me, then my email is fdfhdgfgsf@gmail.com and yes, I'm aware it's basically keyboard spam, but i created the email when i was very young, anyway, go ahead and send me an email there if you have any suggestions, ideas, or really just anything!

See you on the flipside!
